thread.title: Fans push for Romeo Santos waxwork at Madame Tussauds [Photos]
thread.title_full: Fans push for Romeo Santos waxwork at Madame Tussauds [Photos]

title: Fans push for Romeo Santos waxwork at Madame Tussauds [Photos]
text:
Friday, July 31, 2015 07:35 AM MDT Which is the real celebrity? 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the wax figure? (WENN.com/Kim Kardashian Instagram) 
The photo on the right shows the real Kim Kardashian! (Kim Kardashian Instagram) 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (Daniel Deme/WENN.com/David Becker/Getty Images for Madame Tussauds Las Vegas/AFP) 
The photo on the left shows the real Channing Tatum, while the figure on the right is his Magic Mike wax figure at Madame Tussauds Las Vegas. (Daniel Deme/WENN.com/David Becker/Getty Images for Madame Tussauds Las Vegas/AFP) 
The photo on the right shows the real Pink! (WENN.com) 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (WENN.com) 
The real singer Ed Sheeran is on the right! (WENN.com) 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the wax figure? (PNP/WENN.com/Reuters) 
The real Lionel Messi is on the right! (Reuters) 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the wax figure? (WENN.com/Handout) 
The photo of Luke Skywalker on the right is the real one! (Handout) 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the wax figure? (Reuters) 
The real Eurovision 2014 winner Conchita Wurst is on the left! (Reuters) 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (WENN.com) 
The real Jimmy Fallon is on the right! (WENN.com) 
Which is the real celebrity, which is the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (WENN.com) 
The real Pharrell Williams is on the left! (WENN.com) 
Which photo shows the real celebrity and which shows the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (WENN.com/YouTube) 
The photo on the left shows the real Miley Cyrus. (YouTube) 
Which photo shows the real celebrity and which shows the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (Judy Eddy/WENN.com) 
The real Ricky Martin is on the right! (Judy Eddy/WENN.com) 
Which photo shows the real celebrity and which shows the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (WENN.com) 
The photo of One Direction on the left shows the real band! (WENN.com) 
The photo of Prince Harry on the right is the real celebrity! (Zak Hussein/WENN.com) 
The photo of singer Taylor Swift on the left is the real celebrity! (Brian To/WENN.com) 
Which photo shows the real celebrity and which shows the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (WENN.com/Phil Lewis) 
The photo of actor Ryan Gosling on the left is the real celebrity! (WENN.com) 
Which photo shows the real celebrity and which shows the Madame Tussauds wax figure? (SteveWood/www.lostthenfound.info/Handout/Courtesy Madame Tussauds Las Vegas) See the Andy Warhol wax figure in Las Vegas for the first time ever. Madame Tussauds Las Vegas has announced the Warhol wax figure, on loan from Madame Tussauds London, will be on display in Las Vegas from April 24 to Aug. 1, 2014 at Polaroid Fotobar ’s new flagship retail shop, along with an exhibition of Warhol’s artwork and artifacts presented by The Andy Warhol Museum. Admission to The Polaroid Museum on April 24 is free from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. 
The photo of Andy Warhol on the left shows the real artist. (SteveWood/www.lostthenfound.info/Handout) 
Which photo shows the real celebrity and which shows the Madame Tussauds wax figure? DJDM/Pat Denton/ WENN.COM
